reviews.review: CSGO is type of game that will always be popular, a lot of time and skill is required. Only bad thing about it is anticheat system which in my opinion isn't doing a good job and must be changed and improved!!!!

This game will take even the most casual players into rageing competative tryhards! you will be toxic, you will have to live with shit team mates and cheaters everyother game! if you get the game, i STRONGLY recommend bying prime as soon as possible, or you are gonna be screwed over by cheaters.

CS:GO é um jogo muito bom, que roda em qualquer pc, pois ele é um jogo muito leve, mas porém quem têm condições de comprar o prime do CS:GO, compre ele pois na versão gratuita tem muitos hackers e fica chato de jogar, a valve precisa resolver isso na versão gratuita do CS.
